page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Indoor recreation in Kineton can be found in the three public houses and the Sports and Social Club at Little Kineton. Darts, pool, crib, dominoes and fruit machines can be played while there is a skittle alley at the Swan. Most of the outdoor team sports, football, cricket and bowls are held at the Sports and Social Club. At Kineton High School the swimming pool is very popular and frequently used. Badminton, tennis and netball can also be played out of school hours, other swimming pools and tennis courts are privately owned. Keep Fit sessions take place in the Schools and the Sports and Social Club. Bingo is played at the village hall on Thursday evenings and also at the Fire Station Club and the Sports and Social Club.
